body_html:
I think the problem is, we configure using SIMD instruction sets when running with --config=opt. You should be able to solve this by adding --copt=-O2 to our bazelrc when running configure.
As I cannot test this, I will leave this as contributions welcome.
body_text:
I think the problem is, we configure using SIMD instruction sets when running with --config=opt. You should be able to solve this by adding --copt=-O2 to our bazelrc when running configure.
As I cannot test this, I will leave this as contributions welcome.
body:
I think the problem is, we configure using SIMD instruction sets when running with `--config=opt`. You should be able to solve this by adding `--copt=-O2` to our bazelrc when running configure.
As I cannot test this, I will leave this as contributions welcome.
